statements: SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, is_high_risk FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE is_high_risk = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, customer_id FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE is_high_risk = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM high_risk_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE is_high_risk = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM high_risk_transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE security_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, email, risk_score FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id WHERE risk_score < 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, security_level FROM users WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE risk_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE risk_score > 0.8;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp, customer_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, customer_id FROM transactions LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE risk_factor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, rh.timestamp FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_history rh ON t.transaction_id = rh.transaction_id WHERE rh.risk_factor_id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%')

SELECT r.factor_description, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM risk_factors r INNER JOIN transaction_history th ON r.factor_id = th.risk_factor_id GROUP BY r.factor_description ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT transaction_id, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, blacklist_reason FROM transactions_blacklist WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM high_risk_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, blacklist_reason FROM transactions_blacklist ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_risk_transactions JOIN customer_details ON high_risk_transactions.customer_id = customer_details.customer_id WHERE risk_score = 90;
